  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function() {
    
    
    var txt="<a class='b-close'><img src='/App_Themes/NHRC/images/close.png.gif'><a />";
    
    
    $(".Calendar table tr td").click(function(){ 
      txt = "<a class='b-close'><img src='/App_Themes/NHRC/images/close.png'><a />";
      
      $(this).find(".dayEvent").each(function(){ 
        txt += $(this).html();
      }); 
      $(".element_to_pop_up").html(txt);
      if(txt !=  "<a class='b-close'><img src='/App_Themes/NHRC/images/close.png'><a />"){
        pop();
      }
    });
    
    function pop() {
      
      
      $('#element_to_pop_up').bPopup({
        speed: 250//,
      });
    }
    
    $('.Calendar .Title').click(function() {
      //window.location = '/EventCalendar.aspx';
      
      
       var month = $('#hidMonth').val() ; 
       var year = $('#hidYear').val() ;
       if(month == '1'){month = '01';}
       else if(month == '2'){month = '02';}
       else if(month == '3'){month = '03';}
       else if(month == '4'){month = '04';}
       else if(month == '5'){month = '05';}
       else if(month == '6'){month = '06';}
       else if(month == '7'){month = '07';}
       else if(month == '8'){month = '08';}
       else if(month == '9'){month = '09';}
       
       var month = year + "-" + month
           
           window.location = '/EventCalendar.aspx?month='+ month+'&type=1';
       
       //alert("show all month");
     });
    
  });
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   // var jq = $.noconflict();
  $(document).ready(function(){
    
    $(".topic-tab").click(function(){
      $(".topic-tab").removeClass("opentab");
      $(".topic-tab").children("span").removeClass("tabone-open");
      $(".topic-tab").children(".row").children(".tabone").removeClass("contentopentab");
      $(this).addClass("opentab");
      $(this).children("span").addClass("tabone-open");
      $(this).children(".row").children(".tabone").addClass("contentopentab");
    });
    
 
    
    $(".tab-right").click(function(){
       
      
      if( $(".opentab").next(".topic-tab").length > 0){
        
        var nexttopic=$(".opentab").next(".topic-tab").children("h1").text();
        var next= $(".opentab").next(".topic-tab");
        console.log(nexttopic);
        $(".topic-tab").removeClass("opentab");
        $(".topic-tab").children(".row").children(".tabone").removeClass("contentopentab");
        //$(".topic-tab").children(".row").children(".tabone").fadeOut();
        
        next.addClass("opentab");
        $(".opentab").children(".row").children(".tabone").addClass("contentopentab");
        //$(".opentab").children(".row").children(".tabone").fadeIn(400);
        $(".tab-one").children("span").text(nexttopic);
        
        nexttopic="";
        
      }
      else{
      return false;
      }
   
    
    });
    
    
    
    
     $(".tab-left").click(function(){
       
      
      if( $(".opentab").prev(".topic-tab").length > 0){
        
        var prevtopic=$(".opentab").prev(".topic-tab").children("h1").text();
        var prev= $(".opentab").prev(".topic-tab");
        
        $(".topic-tab").removeClass("opentab");
        $(".topic-tab").children(".row").children(".tabone").removeClass("contentopentab");
        //$(".topic-tab").children(".row").children(".tabone").fadeOut();
        
        prev.addClass("opentab");
        $(".opentab").children(".row").children(".tabone").addClass("contentopentab");
      //  $(".opentab").children(".row").children(".tabone").fadeIn(400);
        $(".tab-one").children("span").text(prevtopic);
        
        nexttopic="";
        
      }
      else{
      return false;
      }
   
    
    });
    
    
    
    
    
  });
  </script>

        <script>
         $(document).ready(function(){
  
    $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").children("li:last-child").after("<div class='amnotvisible'><div>");
    $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").addClass("TopMenu-level1");
    $(".TopMenu-level1").not(":last-child").children("a").after("<div class='TopMenu-arrow TopMenu-arrow-left-blue'><div>");
    $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").addClass("TopMenu-level1-ul");
    //ชี้แล้วหัวข้อ level1 มีbgสีขาว 

  $(".TopMenu-level1").hover(function(){

    $(this).children("a").addClass("TopMenu-ul-a-hover");
    
  })
    .mouseleave(function(){
      
      $(this).children("a").removeClass("TopMenu-ul-a-hover");

          $(".ihavechildren").children("ul").slideUp();
          $(".ihavechildren").find(".TopMenu-arrow").removeClass("TopMenu-arrow-down-white");
          $(".ihavechildren").removeClass("ihavechildren-click");
          $(".ihavechildren").children("ul").removeClass("ululul-open");

        });
  
  
  
  $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").children("li").addClass("TopMenu-level2");
  $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").children("li").children("a").addClass("TopMenu-level2-a");
  
  
  //level2 ถ้ามีไส้ให้มี ">"
  $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").children("li").has("ul").addClass("ihavechildren");
  
    $(".ihavechildren").children("a").wrapInner( "<span class='ihavechildren-span'></span>");
  $(".ihavechildren").children("a").children(".ihavechildren-span").after("<div class='test'><div class='TopMenu-arrow TopMenu-arrow-left-blue'></div></div>");
 
    $(".ihavechildren").children("a").addClass("ihavechildren-a");
   // $(".ihavechildren").children("a").css({"width":"85%","padding-right":"0px"});

  
  
  
  
  //ถ้าคลิกหัวข้อlevel2 ให้เปิด level 3
  $(".ihavechildren").click(function(){
    if($(this).children("ul").hasClass("ululul-open")){
      //$(this).children("ul").slideUp(400);
      $(this).children("ul").removeClass("ululul-open");
      $(this).removeClass("ihavechildren-click");
           // $(".ihavechildren").find(".TopMenu-arrow").removeClass("TopMenu-arrow-down-white");
     // $(this).find(".TopMenu-arrow").removeClass("TopMenu-arrow-down-white");
 
    }
      else{
 
        $(".ihavechildren").removeClass("ihavechildren-click");
       // $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").slideUp(400);
         $(".ihavechildren").not(this).children("ul").slideUp(400);
        $(".ihavechildren").children("ul").removeClass("ululul-open");
        $(this).children("ul").addClass("ululul-open");
        $(this).children("ul").slideDown(400);
        
        $(this).addClass("ihavechildren-click");
        $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li").children("ul").children("li").find(".TopMenu-arrow").removeClass("TopMenu-arrow-down-white");
        $(this).find(".TopMenu-arrow").addClass("TopMenu-arrow-down-white");
        
      }
    });
  
  

  $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li:nth-child(2)").children("ul").children(".ihavechildren:nth-child(3)").attr('id', 'ihavechildren-special-1');
  $(".TopMenu").children("ul").children("li:nth-child(2)").children("ul").children(".ihavechildren:nth-child(4)").attr('id', 'ihavechildren-special-2');
  
  
  
  ///////////////////////////this is menu ipad/////////////////////////
  $(".searchinput-ipad").click(function(){
    $(".menuul").slideToggle();
    
  });
  
  
  
  
  var viewportWidth = $(window).width();
  //var viewportHeight = $(window).height();
  if(viewportWidth<767){
  
    
    $(".TopMenu-level1").click(function(){
      $(".TopMenu-level1").not(this).children(".TopMenu-level1-ul").slideUp(400);  
      $(this).children(".TopMenu-level1-ul").slideDown(400);
      
      
      
      $(".TopMenu-level1").removeClass("TopMenu-level1-click");     
      $(this).addClass("TopMenu-level1-click");
      
    });
    
    
  }
  
  else{
  
    
    // 14/9/58  $(".TopMenu-level1").children(".TopMenu-level1-ul").slideUp(400);  
    $(".TopMenu-level1").children(".TopMenu-level1-ul").attr("style","");
    
  }
  
  
  
  
  
  $(window).resize(function() {
    var viewportWidth = $(window).width();

     // console.log("less ");
      
      $(".TopMenu-level1").click(function(){
        $(".TopMenu-level1").not(this).children(".TopMenu-level1-ul").slideUp(400);

});
  
  
  
  
});

      $(document).ready(function () {
	$(".forstaff").hide();


    $(".f-item-forstaff").click(function () {    
        var width = $(window).width(); 
        var height = $(window).height();

        

                $(".forstaff").slideToggle(400);
          	if (width >= 481) {

               if($(".forstaff").is(':visible')){
                  
                 // $(".subhotlineFAQ").css("top", "-171px");
                  //$(".subhotline-map").css("top", "-171px");
                  $(".subhotlineFAQ").toggleClass("subhotlineFAQ-active",400);
                  $(".subhotline-map").toggleClass("subhotline-map-active",400);
                  $(".subhotline-forstaff").toggleClass("subhotline-forstaff-active",400);
          
                }
                else{

                  $(".subhotlineFAQ").removeClass("subhotlineFAQ-active");
                  $(".subhotline-map").removeClass("subhotline-map-active"); 
                  $(".subhotline-forstaff").removeClass("subhotline-forstaff-active",400);
                    }
          	}
         	 else  {
 
                 
                  $(".subhotlineFAQ").toggleClass("subhotlineFAQ-active",400);
                  $(".subhotline-map").toggleClass("subhotline-map-active",400);
  $(".subhotline-forstaff").toggleClass("subhotline-forstaff-active",400);
                  
          	}        


             if( $(this).find(".bt_downFoot").hasClass("bt_downFoot-open") ){
                $(this).find(".bt_downFoot").removeClass("bt_downFoot-open");
                $(this).find(".f-item").removeClass("active");
               
              }else{
                  $(this).find(".bt_downFoot").addClass("bt_downFoot-open");
                 $(this).find(".f-item").addClass("active");
              } 

        });
       
    
     	$(".site-map").find(".close").click(function(){
        
          $(".site-map").slideToggle();
         
          $(".f-item-forstaff").find(".bt_downFoot").removeClass("bt_downFoot-open");
        $(".f-item-forstaff").find(".f-item").removeClass("active");
        });

    
});
     </script>
